title: Civil Litigation
description1: Representing clients in a broad range of disputes, including contracts, property, and torts.
description2: Resolving alimony (spousal support) disputes and ensuring fair settlements.

title: Family Law
description1: Providing compassionate support in matters related to divorce, child custody, and spousal support.
description2: Explore jurisdictional variations and the impact of local laws on the adjudication of claims.

title: Corporate Law
description1: Offering legal guidance to businesses on formation, compliance, mergers, and acquisitions.

title: Criminal Defense
description1: Defending individuals charged with criminal offenses, ensuring their rights are protected.
description2: Explore broader systemic implications, such as the role of civil litigation in shaping societal norms and business practices.

title: Real Estate Law
description1: Assisting clients with property transactions, zoning issues, and landlord-tenant disputes.
description2: Offer recommendations for reducing disputes through alternative dispute resolution methods like mediation and arbitration.
